Console Script¶

Console script entry point for AutoNetkit

autonetkit.console_script.console_entry()[source]¶

If come from console entry point

autonetkit.console_script.file_monitor(filename)[source]¶

Generator based function to check if a file has changed

autonetkit.console_script.manage_network(input_graph_string, timestamp, build_options, reload_build=False, grid=None)[source]¶

Build, compile, render network as appropriate
